description: This is a bash shell script used for managing OCI containers through curl commands to a local server. It provides functions to start, stop, list, get info, pause, resume, and execute commands in containers, as well as a command-line interface for user interaction.

methods.name: start_container_from_bundle
methods.description: Starts a container using an OCI bundle; handles extracting from tarball if necessary.

methods.name: start_container_from_spec
methods.description: Starts a container using a Dobby specification JSON file.

methods.name: stop_container
methods.description: Stops a running container by containerId.

methods.name: get_container_info
methods.description: Retrieves information about a specific container.

methods.name: get_container_state
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of a specified container.

methods.name: execute_command
methods.description: Executes a command within a specified container.

methods.name: ocicontainer_help
methods.description: Displays help information for available commands.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main interactive loop handling user input for container management commands.
